AncientLegendNecklace.Name: Ancient Legend Necklace
AncientLegendNecklace.Tooltip:
A ancient necklace that seems to seal energy.
12% reduced ki usage
9% increased ki damage
-500 max ki
AncientLegendNecklace.TooltipTranslation:
一条古老的项链似乎隐藏着力量.
减少12%气的消耗
增加9%气的伤害
-500气上限

AncientLegendWaistCape.Name: Ancient Legend Waistcape
AncientLegendWaistCape.Tooltip:
A ancient garment made of a ki enhancing material.
14% reduced ki usage
6% increased ki damage
-250 max ki
AncientLegendWaistCape.TooltipTranslation:
使用增强气力量的材料制成的服装.
减少14%气的消耗
增加6%气的伤害
-250气上限

ArmCannon.Name: Arm Cannon
ArmCannon.Tooltip:
An old arm blaster used by many soldiers.
10% Reduced Ki usage
Increased charge speed
ArmCannon.TooltipTranslation:
许多士兵使用的增幅臂铠.
减少10%气的消耗
增加聚气速度

BaldurEssentia.Name: Baldur Essentia
BaldurEssentia.Tooltip:
The essence of strong defense.
Charging grants a protective barrier that grants drastically increased defense
BaldurEssentia.TooltipTranslation:
拥有强大的防御力.
聚气时提供额外的防御

BattleKit.Name: Battle Kit
BattleKit.Tooltip:
'A generic kit of tools for the average soldier.'
6% Increased Ki damage
10% Reduced Ki usage
Hunter effect + Increased charge speed
15% Increased ki cast speed
BattleKit.TooltipTranslation:
'许多士兵使用的基本战斗工具.'
增加6%气的伤害
减少10%气的消耗
显示敌人并增加聚气速度
增加15%蓄力速度

BlackDiamondShell.Name: Black Diamond Shell
BlackDiamondShell.Tooltip:
A jeweled turtle shell that gets the attention of many creatures, for some reason it's unbelievably tough.
12% increased ki damage, 14% increased ki knockback.
+200 Max Ki.
Getting hit restores a small amount of Ki.
BlackDiamondShell.TooltipTranslation:
一种稀有物种的龟壳,异常的坚韧.
增加12%气的伤害, 增加14%气的击退力.
+200气上限.
被击中时回复少量的气.

BloodstainedBandana.Name: Bloodstained Bandana
BloodstainedBandana.Tooltip:
'Change the future.'
14% Increased Ki damage
Thorns effect.
BloodstainedBandana.TooltipTranslation:
'改变未来！.'
增加14%气的伤害
荆棘之力.

BuldariumSigmite.Name: Buldarium Sigmite
BuldariumSigmite.Tooltip:
'A fragment of the god of defense's soul.'
Charging grants a protective barrier that grants massively increased defense
Charging also grants drastically increased life regen
Increased ki charge rate
BuldariumSigmite.TooltipTranslation:
'防御之神的灵魂碎片.'
聚气时提供更多的防御
聚气时会增加生命恢复
增加聚气速度

BurningEnergyAmulet.Name: Burning Energy Amulet
BurningEnergyAmulet.Tooltip:
'A glowing amulet that radiates with extreme heat.'
5% Increased Ki damage
+200 Max ki
Charging grants a aura of fire around you.
BurningEnergyAmulet.TooltipTranslation:
'散发着光热的护身符'
增加5%气的伤害
+200气上限

CrystalliteAlleviate.Tooltip:

+2500 Max ki

Increased ki regen

+1 Max Charges
Increased flight speed

增加气的恢复
减少战斗消耗的气
聚气的恢复量+1
增加战斗速度

EarthenScarab.Name: Earthen Scarab
EarthenScarab.Tooltip:

4% Increased ki damage
Increased flight speed

增加战斗速度

EmeraldNecklace.Name: Emerald Necklace

GoblinKiEnhancer.Name: Goblin Ki Enhancer

IceTalisman.Name: Ice Energy Talisman

IceTalisman.TooltipTranslation:
'散发着寒冰能量的护身符.'

InfuserAmber.Name: Amber Ki Infuser
InfuserAmber.Tooltip: Hitting enemies with ki attacks inflicts ichor.
InfuserAmber.TooltipTranslation: 气的攻击造成脓水效果.

InfuserAmethyst.Name: Amethyst Ki Infuser
InfuserAmethyst.Tooltip: Hitting enemies with ki attacks inflicts shadowflame.
InfuserAmethyst.TooltipTranslation: 气的攻击造成暗影火焰.

InfuserDiamond.Name: Diamond Ki Infuser
InfuserDiamond.Tooltip: Hitting enemies with ki attacks inflicts confusion.
InfuserDiamond.TooltipTranslation: 气的攻击造成混乱效果.

InfuserEmerald.Name: Emerald Ki Infuser
InfuserEmerald.Tooltip: Hitting enemies with ki attacks inflicts poison.
InfuserEmerald.TooltipTranslation: 气的攻击造成中毒效果.

InfuserRainbow.Name: Dragon Crystal Infuser

InfuserRuby.Name: Ruby Ki Infuser
InfuserRuby.Tooltip: Hitting enemies with ki attacks inflicts bleeding.

InfuserSapphire.Name: Sapphire Ki Infuser
InfuserSapphire.Tooltip: Hitting enemies with ki attacks inflicts frostburn.
InfuserSapphire.TooltipTranslation: 气的攻击造成冰焰灼烧.

InfuserTopaz.Name: Topaz Ki Infuser

KaioCrystal.Name: Kaio Crystal

DragonRadar1.Name: Dragon Radar MK1
DragonRadar1.Tooltip:
A low tech piece of equipment used to locate dragon balls.
Holding this will point you in the direction of the nearest dragon ball with bad accuracy,
Getting too close to a dragon ball will overload the radar.

All damage is slowly increased while a boss is alive, limits at 300%.

Taking fatal damage will instead restore you to max life with x2 damage for a short time,

RadiantScalepiece.SetBonus:

SaiyanBreastplate.SetBonus:

ChlorophyteHeadpiece.SetBonus: Getting hit gives greatly increased life regen and ki regen.

OrichalcumHat.SetBonus: Flower petals will fall on your target for extra damage
